description: Try our easy to follow Avocado Poke Boat recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Poke bowl,Pescatarian,Wheat free,Rice,Egg free,Quick & easy lunch,Avocado,Salmon
name: Avocado Poke Boat Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place lime juice and wasabi paste in a small bowl and stir to combine.
Cut avocado in half lengthways and remove seed. Scoop out flesh using a large spoon, reserving skins. Cut flesh into 2cm cubes and add to lime dressing. Toss to coat and set aside.
Place salmon, edamame beans, radish and sesame seeds in a bowl and toss to combine. Toss through avocado pieces.
Divide rice among avocado skins then top with salmon mix. Scatter over spring onions to serve.
